channel.title: Mod - can I have approval for this?
channel.description:
One of the company's I work for would like to have a web developing competition to advertise there site, mainly. the main prize will be cash vch'd or paypal'd. main reason for this is publicity and maybe a job filled or two in the process depending how well the winner'(s) have done.
This was mainly suggested by me to them and they agreed that it might be a good Idea.

item.title: Mod - can I have approval for this?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I don’t see how this really benefits anyone here or the site itself. It sounds to me like a means of advertising and a means of benefiting an organization entirely separate from this site. In simpler lingo, it’s stealing traffic. No would be an equally simple answer.

Read full topic
item.source: Mod - can I have approval for this?

item.title: Mod - can I have approval for this?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

T4_:

This is the wrong site to pull from.

not totally. We have plenty of talented people, they’ll just troll you before they do it right.

Read full topic
